movingObjects

Class HighwayTraffic

  • java.lang.Object
    • movingObjects.Traffic
      • movingObjects.HighwayTraffic

  • public class HighwayTraffic
extends Traffic
    This class defines the highway objects and how they are drawn and move.
    Author:
    JillianJiggs
